title: Ping spike is insane and i keep getting disconnected
body: My normal ping is 70-80 and when lag spike happens (Before patch 5.6) the ping goes up to 200-300.  Now especially after patch 5.7 my ping had become significantly worst. My normal ping now is 120-140 and when lag spike happens it shot up to 500 and then it kept increasing till i get disconnected. The highest ping i had experience is 2500 ... Please fix this ...

replies.body:
It's probably the servers, but we might be able to do something to reduce the effects of it in the meantime.

Firstly, what OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
Windows 8.1 OS and an average of 60 FPS. Not sure about the ISP

>People using internet and not knowing their ISP.

That's more philosophical than an actual issue, though, so I won't berate you as an individual for that. I guess I just have to accept it.

To check what ISP you're with, ask the person who gave you access to the internet what company they signed up with.

The servers are currently experiencing a bit off difficulty, but it shouldn't be that bad unless you had a bad connection to begin with. You might want to consider getting an upgrade.
